Player Command
==============

See: :doc:`brief <brief>` 

USAGE

 |  ``verbose``
 |  ``verbose on|off``

This shows whether you are using verbose or brief mode, and allows you to
switch between them.

Room descriptions are suppressed in "brief" mode, so beware of unexpected
encounters if you choose to use it...
